name: compostables
title: Compostables
author: RR
description:
Introduces composting mechanics to Factorio!

Create wood chips from wood, then combine them with water to make compost.
The compost naturally spoils into landfill over time, providing a renewable source of landfill for base building.

Features two composting methods: using spoilage or wood chips with water.
Perfect for players who want more sustainable resource management and additional landfill production options.
